attributes.additional_details:
This petition has been created as the people of the UK are tired of seeing sex offenders, murderers & paedophiles receiving small sentences and being kept in prison with luxuries that some working people cannot afford. These people take Human Rights away from others when committing these crimes and should be allowed to hide behind the law.

*NO MORE LUXURIES IN PRISON (XBOX's & SKY TV)
*HARSHER SENTENCES FOR REPEAT OFFENDERS & NO EARLY RELEASE
*NO NAME CHANGES AFTER SENTENCE
*CONTINUED SUPERVISON AFTER RELEASE FOR MINIMUM OF AT LEAST 5 YEARS
*POSSIBLE DEATH PENALTY
